attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for peadophiles and child killers.if there is 100% proof these people are guilty they should not be allowed to live.
attributes.additional_details: I think it is disgusting that peadophiles and child killers are protected by our government and are free to walk our streets if you commit either of these crimes ONCE you are no longer human and should not have any human rights and be protected and giving new identities by the government.bring back the death penalty for these sick people or lock them up forever so they can never hurt another child again.
